# Install GNU compilers {.unnumbered}

- This container uses the GNU compilers, [gcc, version 11.3.0](https://gcc.gnu.org/gcc-11/) and [gfortran, version 11.3.0](https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/gcc-11.3.0/gfortran.pdf).

- gcc is installed along with build-essentials in the defintion file.

```
  apt -y update
  apt -y install build-essential
```

- The gfortran compiler is installed separately in the defintion file.
```
  apt -y install gfortran
```
